S

showFaceUp(int, int) - Method in class Concentration
Set tile to show its card in the face up state Precondition: gameboard is populated with tiles, row values (i values) must be in the range of 0 to gameboard.length, column values (j values) must be in the range of 0 to gameboard[0].length

T

Tile - Class in <Unnamed>
A tile in the game of Concentration, i Tiles are arranged on an n x m board, represented in a 2-dim array In this version, a tile contains a card, similar to a playing card.

Construct a tile with a string value.
